result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Markus Latavis Wright

records.addlTxt: Notice of Motion and Motion to Adjourn, filed.

Defendant Markus Latavis Wright in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a plea and sentencing.  Defense is requesting a final pretrial and jury trial date.
  Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 11-9-22 at 1:30 pm for final pretrial and 11-14-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Markus Latavis Wright in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense is requesting a plea and sentencing date. Case is adjourned to 8-11-22 at 2:30 pm for plea and sentencing in person in Room 504 of the Courthouse.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Markus Latavis Wright in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Markus Latavis Wright appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests additional status conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for June 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marcus Latavis Wright in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Milwaukee Police Detective paige Carloni.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  
Case is adjourned to 5-25-22 at 8:30 am for scheduling conference.
  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
  Status conference scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marcus Latavis Wright in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marcus Latavis Wright appeared by video means with Attorney.  
Case in court for status of counsel.  Defense requests a preliminary hearing.  Case remains calendared in Branch 10.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 15, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Marcus Latavis Wright in court.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin. All parties appeared by video conference.
Case in court for status of counsel.  No attorney has been appointed.  Defendant is to contact SPD forthwith.  Case is adjourned to 3-28-22 at 1:30 pm for status of counsel.
  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for March 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Marcus Latavis Wright in court.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Case in court for a preliminary hearing.  No attorney appears. Defendant is not working and may now quaulify for public defender representation.  Defendant is to contact state public defender's office to be interviewed.  Case is adjourned to 3-4-22 at 8:30 am for status of counsel.
  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for March 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 1 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.
Court ordered an oral no unsupervised contact with the victim unless allowed for by DMCPS or CCC or Family Court Orders.

Defendant Marcus Latavis Wright in court with attorney Melissa Jane Fitzsimmons.  Defendant Marcus Latavis Wright in custody.  Mario Fiumefreddo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
